tasks.task: Planting Atlantic dill giant pumpkin seeds
subtasks: Retrieve a 4x4 container
Fill the container with moist potting soil
Make a hole in the soil for the seed, aligning the pointy end downward
Soak seeds in warm water for four hours prior to planting
Plant the seeded in pre-prepared hole
Cover the seed with soil without pressing firmly
Water the planted seed lightly
Transfer the container to a germination station with a heat mat and cover
Maintain temperature around 78-80 degrees Fahrenheit
Provide grow light for the first 48 hours after germination to prevent legginess

tasks.task: Transplanting seedlings when they have their first true leaf
subtasks: Wait until first true leaf emerges and establish two initial leaves
Monitor the direction the first true leaf points to indicate vine growth direction
Transfer seedlings outdoors when weather permits, handling small plants to minimize shock
Train the vine to grow in the desired direction using the initial leaf orientation as a guide
